show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: In An Insane World The Sane Man Appears Insane

title: In An Insane World The Sane Man Appears Insane
content:
The story of two politicians arriving late for a plane and being thrown off by the irate passengers. The crazy behavior currently seen at a market top: IPOs at ridiculous valuations, excessive risk taken by investors, companies with no earnings being sold at wildly improbable prices and crazy values given to hard assets.
Listen to Nigel Farage on Ukraine and the EU.
What life is like for the very poor.
The sobering and horrendous state of Britain today post-Scottish referendum.
No hope of recovery in the housing sector.
Organisations putting pressure on the Obama Administration to ditch the system of fast-track negotiations, specifically designed to counter the TPA deal with Asia.
Important divergences in the stock market.
An American who wants to leave the US Workers in China on strike because they didnâ€™t receive mooncakes.
The return on investment in a condom.
